img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a7/Wukong_Pagoda_20.jpg)
Back at the top of the stairs to the second level, head along the outside path to the right this time. The first open cell as you head this direction will have a green Wisp to absorb to replenish some of your gourd's healing charges.
img_below_text:
Continue past the next open area with a Frozen Corpse and Cyan Bat hiding nearby, and you'll pass another cell with a purple seal that holds a strong enemy with a Spirit inside. There's another Cyan Bat guarding this door, and an Abomination not far ahead waiting to lunge at you.
![Wukong Pagoda 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Wukong_Pagoda_22.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 22 from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 20.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a7/Wukong_Pagoda_20.jpg)
Back at the top of the stairs to the second level, head along the outside path to the right this time. The first open cell as you head this direction will have a green Wisp to absorb to replenish some of your gourd's healing charges."
            - Following Text: "Continue past the next open area with a Frozen Corpse and Cyan Bat hiding nearby, and you'll pass another cell with a purple seal that holds a strong enemy with a Spirit inside. There's another Cyan Bat guarding this door, and an Abomination not far ahead waiting to lunge at you.
![Wukong Pagoda 22.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Wukong_Pagoda_22.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a character navigating a dark, rocky corridor within the pagoda, approaching a cell with a glowing purple seal. The scene is part of a walkthrough for the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The preceding text mentions encountering a green Wisp for healing, while the following text warns of a strong enemy and Cyan Bat near the sealed cell. The image serves to illustrate the player's progress and upcoming challenges in this section of the game.
